https://www.linkedin.com/company/77737081/

I spearheaded the development of the groundbreaking BlitzAI framework from inception, which has become an integral part of our company's toolkit for conducting diverse proof-of-concepts. Within BlitzAI, my responsibilities encompassed a wide array of tasks, including development, maintenance, deployment, and cutting-edge research aimed at devising innovative approaches for creating highly accurate and efficient ML and DL models. My expertise within BlitzAI revolved around crafting state-of-the-art solutions for critical tasks such as text classification, token classification, question answering, and invoice parsing. Leveraging the power of various encoder-decoder models, including the renowned BARD and DONUT architectures, I pushed the boundaries of performance to deliver exceptional results.By continuously refining and enhancing BlitzAI, I have consistently delivered advanced capabilities, enabling our company to stay at the forefront of AI-powered solutions.
